name: Cambridge_Ash_Convertible_Sofa_Bed
description:
Get a modern look that adds comfort and style to your home with the Cambridge Convertible Sofa Bed. A European style with a sleek design will inspire a fresh look and bring comfort to your living space. With a hide away center console tray with cup holders you can now flip down the middle back cushion for added convenience and to keep drinks and snacks at hand. 
Seating space to accommodate everybodyDurable premium fabric requires minimal maintenanceButtoned back cushion for extra styleSofa converts into a sofa bed using click-clack mechanismHide away center console tray with cup holdersOther color finishes are availableEasy minimal assembly of arms and legsSofa dimensions: About Width: 77.17in Depth: 33.86in Height: 30.31inBed dimensions: About Width: 77.17in Depth: 42.52in Height: 14.96inSeat Height: About 14.96in Seat Depth: About 21.65inType: Recliner, Sleeper Sofa, SofaMaterial: WoodStyle: Mid-Century, Contemporary, Modern, Urban, TransitionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: AshColor: GreyStyleContemporary, Mid-Century, Modern, Transitional, UrbanMaterialWoodTypeRecliner, Sleeper Sofa, SofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGrey
